page.title: 10LLANGADOG-COMMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The village Community Centre is one of the most important and busiest places in Llangadog.Many activites take place in the Centre and not one night goes by without something happening here. The Centre contains a large hall,small hall,snooker room,kitchen and another meeting room.Originally there was an old Y.M.C.A hall in the village.It was a wooden building and had corrugated zinc roof.It was in bad state and in 1975 the new Centre was opened in its place.Most of the building was built by the villagers. A management committee runs the hall and every organization in the village has one member on this committee.The Brownies, Y.F.C club,old age Pensioners, Playgroup,Gardening club,W.I,Sports club,Keep fit,Badminton club,etc.,all use the Centre.Concerts,Dramas and even furniture sales are held here.
